title: 37.8 Perch Land (with house) for Sale in Wennappuwa Town
details:
Suitable for Commercial or Residential purposes
35 meters from the Colombo Chillaw Main Road
With Water, Electricity, and Telephone
We have fixed a Tubewell as well

The land is adjoining to HNB Bank land. There are other banks, Cargills supermarket and fuel station are close by. Walking distance to Holy Family Convent and St. Joseph Vaz College.

House: 3 Bed Room, 2 Bath Rooms

Address: 560, Jayasri Mawatha, Wennappuwa

(Price is negotiable)
